la-soufriere.description: Active volcano and highest peak in the Lesser Antilles at 1,467m. Challenging hike through tropical rainforest with stunning crater views and sulfur vents.

pointe-des-chateaux.name: Pointe des Ch√¢teaux
pointe-des-chateaux.description: Dramatic rocky peninsula where the Atlantic Ocean meets the Caribbean Sea. Features stunning coastal views, a cross monument, and pristine beaches.

carbet-falls.name: Carbet Falls
carbet-falls.description: Three spectacular waterfalls cascading through lush rainforest in the Basse-Terre National Park. The second fall (110m) is the most accessible.

memorial-acte.name: Memorial ACTe
memorial-acte.description: World-class museum dedicated to the history and memory of slavery and the slave trade. Housed in a striking modern building in Pointe-√†-Pitre.

grande-anse-beach.name: Grande Anse Beach
grande-anse-beach.description: Long golden sand beach on Basse-Terre with calm waters, palm trees, and local food vendors. Perfect for swimming and relaxation.

cousteau-reserve.name: Jacques Cousteau Reserve
cousteau-reserve.description: Protected marine park around Pigeon Island with coral reefs, sea turtles, and tropical fish. Premier snorkeling and diving destination.

les-saintes.name: Les Saintes Archipelago
les-saintes.description: Charming island group with Fort Napoleon, Pain de Sucre beach, and colorful villages. Day trip by ferry from Trois-Rivi√®res.

pointe-noire.name: Pointe-Noire
pointe-noire.description: Picturesque coastal village known for wood crafts, vanilla plantations, and beautiful black sand beaches. Gateway to the rainforest.

distillery-damoiseau.name: Damoiseau Distillery
distillery-damoiseau.description: Working rum distillery offering tours and tastings. Learn about traditional rhum agricole production on Grande-Terre.

jardin-botanique.name: Botanical Garden of Deshaies
jardin-botanique.description: Stunning 7-hectare tropical garden with exotic plants, waterfalls, and colorful birds. Former property of French singer Coluche.

port-louis.name: Port-Louis Beach
port-louis.description: Beautiful beach with golden sand and turquoise waters on Grande-Terre's north coast. Popular for swimming and local cuisine.
